name: Alexandra
description:
Objective:

Recharge the antenna tower to be able to send an SOS signal to the empire.

Guide/Controls:

Press Spacebar to proceed with the introduction.

Use W, A, S, D to control the character.

Buttons on the upper right controls the drone.

You can cancel a task anytime by just clicking another button.

Buttons on the upper left will only be activated if you collide with the cube pod.

If ever the drone ran out of power, just try to get close to it and press the button on the lower right to pick it up.

A discharged drone should be moved close to the cube pod to recharge.

Just make sure you have enough wood to convert it into useful energy.

Watch out also on your hunger meter as the character needs to eat also. 

Some other note:

There is no sound yet in the game as I prefer making my own asset for this.

This was in prototype stage if ever I have more time, I'll probably improve this.

Developer/Artist: Howard Soriano
